title: kanavilum kamala
sahitya:
kanavilum kamalak-kazhaliNai tanaiyE kanivuDan tudikka varamaruL tAyE

anupallavi

tanad-arivillAduriya nilai peravE manamurugi ishai malargaLai tUviyE

caraNam

vanakkuyil inamum vAnambADiyum unadaDi ninaindE uLLam pongiyE
dinakaran tUNDavE dEiva gItangaL ghana nayamuDanE gAnam pozhivadu pOl
